name: Vizelia
overview: Vizelia S.A. develops software solutions to manage energy and water usage. It offers VIZELIA Green City, a solution to optimize maintenance and repair budgets for property portfolios with individual requirements; VIZELIA Green Campus, a solution for university and professional college technical service departments; VIZELIA Green Building, which is used to manage energy and maintenance expenditure; and VIZELIA Green Bank, which is used to manage various branches and oversee maintenance work by various service providers. The company also provides VIZELIA Green Home, which is used to manage housing organizationsâ€™ cycles; VIZELIA Green Utilities, a solution to automate the collection of consumption/production data, manage technical interventions, and offer services to clients; and VIZELIA Green Retail, a solution used to manage energy costs related to cold chain, air conditioning, heating, and lighting in retail outlets. In addition, its solutions include real estate module to manage property assets; building maintenance module to manage tenants’ maintenance requests; and energy module to track buildings’ energy consumption. Vizelia S.A. was founded in 1987 and is based in Nanterre, France. As of December 9, 2010, Vizelia S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Schneider Electric S.A.

acquisition.source_description: Schneider Electric Makes Two Buys in Building Management
